body.name: MOERDENG Women's Winter Windproof Warm Down Coats Waterproof Thicken Hooded fashions Puffer Jacket
features: This women's warm down Coats has a removable hood and hood hair, giving you more options for your winter ensemble.
This winter coat is filled with a lot of insulation and the density of polyester is 65% higher than what is usually found in the market. It ensures that you stay warm in the cold weather.
With windproof ribbed cuffs and high density fabric, it has good windproof in winter windy weather. Don't let the winter wind make you shiver, it will make you more comfortable in winter.
The simple, stylish and generous design with golden ratio stitching makes this women's winter coat full of this modern aesthetic and fashion. So even in winter, you still look stunning!
Please note: The warm down jacket will be folded and compacted inside the package upon delivery, so you may find it thin and flat; if so, gently pat the jacket with your hand and let it hang up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable and warm!
reviews.reviewText: So my current job has me working outside for multiple hours in the mountains. I needed a good coat to keep me warm. A coat that would cover my butt and thighs, and I hate wearing hats, so it also had to have a hood. This completely fits the bill.It’s very lightweight, and very comfortable. But don’t let that make you think that it’s not going to keep you warm, because it’s great at doing that as well. Almost feels like I’m wearing a down comforter as a coat. I don’t think that this will suffice in below zero temperatures. You need something a lot more heavy duty for that. But in normal cold weather, including rain or snow, it should do nicely.At just under 5 feet tall it covers me almost down to my knees. That could have caused a problem with sitting or walking, but fortunately it has a double zipper. So I can unzip the bottom as much as I need to, while having the rest of the coat zipped up to my chin.The detachable hood is roomy and warm. And it lays down nicely without bunching or pulling on the coat. The faux fur is a nice touch. My only complaint is that I wish that the hood had snaps on it so that you could close it up at the bottom when you had the hood up.As for the shape of the coat, it’s nicely fitted, but as it’s a “puffer” coat it’s not exactly slimming. But that’s the least of my worries. Amazon recommended me the large, but after reading the reviews I decided to size down. And I don’t regret it. In the medium I have enough room to wear thicker clothing if I want, but it’s not hanging off me like a sack.In conclusion, I totally recommend this if you’re looking for a longer coat with a hood that can keep you warm in reasonably cold weather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SUPER Warm & Cozy
reviews.reviewText: I just got this coat and absolutely love it. Not only is it cute but I was immediately warm/hot from just wearing it around my apartment. So this is exactly what I was looking for for the cold winter weather coming up. I did take off the ugly furry zippered trim around the hood cause it looks way better and smaller without it (or choose to remove the hood completely as it’s also zippered). For reference: I’m 5 foot 4 and 147lbs and got the Medium in Black. In pic I only have a long sleeve blouse underneath but could definitely wear a sweater (even a thick one) and would still have room and be comfortable. It also has one very deep pocket on the inside for ur phone & keys and even a small wallet would fit! If ur looking for a very warm, cute and affordable coat, this is it. Hope this review helps ! BTW, if ur interested in the boots in the pics, I also got these here on Amazon from Columbia ‘Ice Maiden II, love how they match with my coat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality jacket - pretty, warm, sturdy zipper
reviews.reviewText: I bought this jacket for my teen daughter. The size was exactly as described and the jacket surprised me with its quality and detail (pockets, zippers, thickness of material). My daughter loves how warm it is, but what I love about it the most is how it's just not getting dirty even if it's very light in color (we picked light pink). The product is quite comparable to my brand name winter jacket which I purchased in a traditional retail store for twice the price. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars super cute & super warm
reviews.reviewText: i love this coat i'm usually a black coat girl or a color that matches every thing but i was trying something different this year ! i love the coat and get plenty of compliments on it 🥰 it's super warm sometimes i get too hot in it but it's super comfortable my only issue is the hat is really big. i'm not really a hat person but when i do wear it sometimes it falls off a lot !! so if your a hood person idk 🤷🏽‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I 5'4" and weight about 170 and I got the xl and it fits great, a bit long but when you walk kids to school everyday is helps. This coat keeps me warm every single day I have to walk kids to school. I love the inside of the jacket and how fuzzy and warm it is. I am sure this would be a great coat to have in the mountains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Winter Investment
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the MOERDENG Women's Winter Windproof Warm Down Coat, and it has quickly become my go-to winter essential. The Amazon Choice badge is well-deserved for this fantastic piece. As soon as I put it on, I felt the immediate warmth and coziness it provides. The coat effortlessly filters raindrops, keeping me dry and comfortable in unpredictable weather.The hood is not only functional but also adds an elegant touch to the overall design. I appreciate the roomy fit, especially for those who prefer a larger size. The inner layer's warmth is exceptional, making this coat perfect for chilly days. The combination of style and functionality makes it a versatile choice for various winter activities. I'm confident that this investment will serve me well throughout the season. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm comfortable waterproof coat!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my daughter who has Raynaud's and is cold all the time, her favorite color is purple and she LOVES IT!!! She is about 5'7" tall and very thin 108 lbs so the medium fit her perfectly with a little room for thick clothing. I put pictures of side, front and back of her wearing the coat. It's a beautiful deep shade of purple with removable faux fur trim and hood, plus the zippered pockets have a waterproof layer which is great and the front double zipper is easy to maneuver which is good since sometimes those double zippers are difficult but this one is smooth and doesn't get stuck. This coat has the warm fuzzy inside and super warm. Great coat! Mi hija fria loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars YES! YES! YES!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this coat to travel to Norway and Sweden in January temps. SOO cozy and warm. Perfect length. I’m 5’3”, 150 lbs and ordered medium. Still plenty of room to wear a hoodie underneath. LOVE the deep pockets! Appearance is not form-fitting but that’s ok because I was going for warmth not flattering. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewTitle: Windproof...this is the best coat I have
reviews.reviewText: Being Canadian, we are always looking for the warmest coat.I've tried down filled, wool but this coat also stops wind and cold...incredible, also lightweight...but a bargain!!!!
Love the color of this coat (pink) bought med and fits perfectly. Not too big yet roomy enough to wear a thicker sweater underneath. Love it!
So warm and so good looking - and very comfy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Hood is wide for the head
reviews.reviewText: The hood is too wide and not covering the head. Would be difficult to protect from wind and cold weather. A draw string or a protection would be great. Otherwise it is warm and very good.
